column5: The existing canal has been concreted 1000m length(height=0.45m, width=0.6m, thickness 0.125m). The rest of the canal is an earthen canal.  165 Acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal. At present farmers used canal. The canal area is very dangerous, and this section might be landslide again.
column6:
Construction of 2.0m high 1:3:6 (40mm) cement concrete Retaining Wall 
Miscellaneous
Contingencies 10%

column5: At present earthen canals.
column6:
Canals reservation protection by concrete lining  For  125mm thick , 0.5m  wide  and 0.4m high canal -double banking
Stream / canal  reservation protection by earthfilling of  strip   of 1.5m to 2m wide  and average Depth of 0.5m
Vegetative cover improving for narrow strips (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Arecanut seedlings at 1.5m spacing in 2 rows, Betel plants VP at 3m spacing in 1 row, Green gram as a cover crop
Miscellaneous
Contingencies 10%

column5: Existing anicut constructed stone and Soil
